name: Spooky Doop
description:
Overview

You find yourself in a deep, underground, abandoned, medieval tunnel with only a torch to your name. In the distance, you hear footsteps and an eerie breath. Somehow you escape to a futuristic space station. How did that happen? How does any of this make sense? Only death knows the answer.

System Requirements

Spooky Doop requires the following PC specs:

Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater

Memory: 8GB+ RAM

Operating System: Windows 10 or macOS (Both Intel and Silicon are Supported)

Controls First Person

W - Move Forward

S - Move Backward

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Mouse - Look

E/Mouse Left Click - Interact

G - Throw

Esc - Pause Menu
